campaign.title: Making History
campaign.subtitle: Building Our Forever Home
campaign.description: We are embarking on an exciting journey to secure a permanent home for Windsor Gospel Assembly. This historic campaign will enable us to purchase a building that will serve our growing congregation and community for generations to come.

highlights.title: Permanent Worship Space
highlights.description: A beautiful sanctuary designed for meaningful worship experiences

highlights.title: Community Programs
highlights.description: Dedicated spaces for youth programs, small groups, and community events

highlights.title: Future Growth
highlights.description: Room to accommodate our growing congregation and expanding ministries

highlights.title: Legacy Investment
highlights.description: Building a lasting foundation for future generations

testimonials.name: Pastor Johnson
testimonials.quote: This building represents more than just a physical space - it's a foundation for the spiritual growth and community impact that God has called us to.

testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.quote: Having our own space will allow us to serve our community in ways we've only dreamed of. We're not just making history, we're building the future.
